txt_en: May our country prosper and the people live a peaceful life!
txt_cn: 愿祖国繁荣富强，人民安居乐业！

txt_en: Winners never quit!
Nothing that has meaning is easy.
txt_cn: 有意义的事往往不易做到。

txt_en: Something extraordinary happens.
txt_cn: 妙不可言的事正在发生。

txt_en: Even suffering has its own meaning.
I love you more than anything.
Everything that has happened to you is a gift.
If we want to do it, we can do it.
All of human wisdom can be summed up in these two words: wait and hope.
txt_cn: 人类的智慧皆可归结为两个词：等待与希望。

txt_en: Tomorrow will be better.
I like to feel his eyes on me when I look away.
txt_cn: 我喜欢我望向别处时，他看着我的目光。

txt_en: Follow your heart.
Everything happens in good time.
Let's keep going.
I will always be there for you.
You can't blend in when you were born to stand out.
txt_cn: 你无法融入人群，只因生来与众不同。

txt_en: Everybody deserves kindness.
You are the wind beneath my wings.
txt_cn: 你是我羽翼下的风，给予我力量。

txt_en: A friend is what the heart needs all the time.
Because the dark surrounds us, let us turn our faces to the light.
txt_cn: 身陷黑暗之中，也要心向光明。

txt_en: The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all.
txt_cn: 或许勇气不能长盛不衰，可是胆怯必然百无一用。

txt_en: I'm the creator of my own destiny.
